Content:
Lich Form
Breathe chilling wind in a cone, dealing [1] damage to all non-allied characters and freezing the ground.
If the target is Chilled/Wet, apply Frozen for 1 turn.
Otherwise, apply Chilled for 2 turns.
<font color='#73F6FF'>Winter's Breath</font>

Launch a soul-infused missile from your staff that deals [1] and marks the target for death.
If the target dies while marked, their soul explodes for [2] within a [3] radius.
<font color='#D040D0'>Wicked Missile</font>

Hemomancy
Call forth the blood of beings within [1], causing it to burst.
Living targets create a small pool of blood, while the undead spill poison.
Blood Burst

Lich Form
Exude a chilling aura of death for 3 turns, gaining [1]% Water Resistance, Immunity to Slipping and Burning, and [2]% increased speed on ice.
At the end of your turn, allies within [3] who are Burning or Warm are cooled down, enemies within [3] are Chilled, and Frozen enemies take [4], healing you for the damage dealt.
<font color='#73F6FF'>Death's Embrace</font>

Phylactery Power
Store your soul in a Phylactery, granting immortality as long as it is not destroyed.
Only one Phylactery per Lich can exist at a time.
Upon nearly dying, you will be teleported to your Phylactery to regenerate. If the Phylactery is in your inventory, you will regenerate at the location of your 'death'.
<font color='#73F6FF'>Create Phylactery</font>

Lich Form
Let loose a dreadful shout, lowering the primary attributes of enemies within a [1] radius for 3 turns.
On death, nearby characters with Dread have a:
50% chance to become Feared
25% chance to become Mad
<font color='#73F6FF'>Dreadwave</font>

Phylactery Power
Teleport to your Phylactery.
If your phylactery is in possession of an opposing player (not in your party), teleportation will be blocked.
<font color='#73F6FF'>Return to Phylactery</font>

Lich Form
Place your chilling hand on the target, dealing [1].
If the target is Wet/Chilled, apply Frozen for 1 turn.
If the target is not Wet/Chilled/Frozen, apply Chilled for 2 turns.
If the target is Frozen, deal [2].
<font color='#73F6FF'>Chilling Touch</font>

Phylactery Power
Drain the soul of an enemy, dealing [1].
If this skill kills the target:
Restore 1 Power to your Phylactery.
Gain 1 Source Point.
If at max Source Points, create an explosion of source, dealing [2] to enemies in a [3] radius.
Shadow Damage bypasses armor and cannot be resisted.
<font color='#73F6FF'>Drain Soul</font>

Lich Form
Sacrifice the blood of a non-undead target character, receiving 1 AP and a [1]% damage boost, while reducing the target's Constitution by [2].
<font color='#73F6FF'>Blood Sacrifice</font>

Lich Form
Deal [1] damage to a target character, paralyzing them for 1 turn.
If the target does not have Magic Armor, apply Stunned.
Otherwise, if the target does not have Physical Armor, apply Knocked Down.
<font color='#73F6FF'>Paralyzing Touch</font>
<font color='#73F6FF'>Dominate Undead</font>

Lich Form
You have a level of control over the Undead, allowing you to turn them to your side for [1] turn(s).
Undead with an Intelligence higher than [1] have a chance to resist the effect, while Undead with an Intelligence of [2] or higher are immune to mental control.
